text: José Cláudio Lazzarotto (born 12 October 1958) is a Brazilian rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: José Cláudio Lazzarotto
